org.cdf.ddd.runtime.registry

类 Container

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.cdf.ddd.runtime.registry.Container

  • public final class Container
extends Object
    业务容器，用于动态加载个性化业务包：Plugin Jar.

    Container常驻内存，PluginJar动态加载：动静分离

                                                      +- 1 JDKClassLoader
 Container -> Plugin -> PluginClassLoader --------|- 1 ContainerClassLoader
                              | loadClass         +- N PluginClassLoader
                        +---------------------+
                        |                     |
                  (Partner | Pattern)      Extension

    • 方法概要

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      Map<String,IPlugin> getActivePlugins()
      获取当前所有活跃的Plugin.
      static Container getInstance()
      获取业务容器单例.
      void loadPartnerPlugin(String code, String jarPath, boolean useSpring)
      加载业务前台jar包.
      void loadPartnerPlugin(String code, URL jarUrl, boolean useSpring)
      加载业务前台jar包.

      • 从类继承的方法 java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • 方法详细资料

      • getInstance

        @NotNull
public static Container getInstance()
        获取业务容器单例.

      • getActivePlugins

        @NotNull
public Map<String,IPlugin> getActivePlugins()
        获取当前所有活跃的Plugin.
        返回:
        key: Plugin code

      • loadPartnerPlugin

        public void loadPartnerPlugin(@NotNull
                              String code,
                              @NotNull
                              URL jarUrl,
                              boolean useSpring)
                       throws Throwable
        加载业务前台jar包.
        参数:
        code - IPlugin.getCode()
        jarUrl - Plugin jar URL
        useSpring - jar包里是否需要Spring机制
        抛出:
        Throwable

      • loadPartnerPlugin

        public void loadPartnerPlugin(@NotNull
                              String code,
                              @NotNull
                              String jarPath,
                              boolean useSpring)
                       throws Throwable
        加载业务前台jar包.

        如果使用本动态加载，就不要maven里静态引入业务前台jar包依赖了.

        参数:
        code - IPlugin.getCode()
        jarPath - jar path
        useSpring - jar包里是否需要Spring机制
        抛出:
        Throwable
